Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor.passive

Class Scheduler<A extends PassiveActor>

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.actor.Behavior
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor.Executor<A>
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor.passive.Scheduler<A>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CycleScheduler, OldScheduler, OneScheduler, PersistentScheduler, SharedScheduler, TemporaryScheduler
public abstract class Scheduler<A extends PassiveActor>
extends Executor<A>
The Scheduler class provides a partial implementation of a behavior of the executor actor used for creating and executing passive actors.
See Also:
PassiveActor, Serialized Form

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Scheduler.Cycle
    The Cycle enumeration defines an event that an executor actor for passive actors may use for informing about the end of an execution cycle of the actors of the actor space.
